Package controller

Class StockControllerGUIImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.StockControllerGUIImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Features, StockController
    public class StockControllerGUIImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockController, Features
    This class implements the Features and StockControllerGUI interface. It has implementation methods for calling the view to perform various stock operations on the GUI. These include creation and modification using earlier methods, investment strategy and dollar cost averaging, uploading an existing portfolio, retrieving composition, total, cost basis and performance graph of a portfolio.

      • createDcaPortfolio

        public void createDcaPortfolio​(java.lang.String pfName,
                               java.lang.String invtAmt,
                               java.lang.String commFee,
                               java.lang.String tickerSymbol,
                               java.lang.String perc,
                               java.lang.String startDate,
                               java.lang.String endDate,
                               java.lang.String interval,
                               boolean flagForPfName,
                               boolean flagForStocks)
        Description copied from interface: Features
        This method receives the values entered by the user for portfolio creation using Dollar Cost Averaging. It calls the model for validating the inputs and throws an error or success message accordingly.
        Specified by:
        createDcaPortfolio in interface Features
        Parameters:
        pfName - portfolio name
        invtAmt - investment amount
        commFee - commission fee
        tickerSymbol - ticker symbol for investing
        perc - percentage of the investment amount to be invested in a particular stock.
        startDate - start date of the investment strategy.
        endDate - end date of the investment strategy.
        interval - intervals in which user wants to invest.
        flagForPfName - to check if portfolio name field is disabled or enabled.
        flagForStocks - to check if stock name field is disabled or enabled.

      • createInvtPortfolio

        public void createInvtPortfolio​(java.lang.String pfName,

                                java.lang.String perc,

        Description copied from interface: Features
        This method gets the details entered by the user for investing an amount in several stocks on a specific date.
        Specified by:
        createInvtPortfolio in interface Features
        Parameters:
        pfName - portfolio name for creation.
        invtAmt - money to be invested.
        commFee - commission fee.
        tickerSymbol - ticker symbol to be bought.
        perc - percentage split of how the money is to be invested.
        date - date on which investment is to be done.
        flagForPfName - if portfolio name field is enabled or disabled.
        flagForStocks - if ticker symbol field is enabled or disabled.
